title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 05, 2024
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 05, 2024 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Eslint
items.content_text:
### Plugins / Code Quality

*   [depend (⭐404)](https://github.com/es-tooling/eslint-plugin-depend) - Helps detect dependency tree bloat and redundant polyfills.

### Tools / Testing Tools

*   [eslint-plugin-rule-adoption (⭐1)](https://github.com/Jugbot/eslint-plugin-rule-adoption) - An eslint plugin for incremental rule adoption, when `--fix` and codemods don't cut it.
items.content_html:
Plugins / Code Quality

  • depend (⭐404) - Helps detect dependency tree bloat and redundant polyfills.

Tools / Testing Tools

  • eslint-plugin-rule-adoption (⭐1) - An eslint plugin for incremental rule adoption, when --fix and codemods don't cut it.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Icon / Diagnostics

*   [echasnovski/mini.nvim#mini.icons (⭐7.5k)](https://github.com/echasnovski/mini.nvim/blob/main/readmes/mini-icons.md) - Module of `mini.nvim` meant as a general icon provider. Uses fixed set of highlight groups. Supports various categories, icon and style customizations, caching for performance. Integrates with built-in filetype matching.
items.content_html:
Icon / Diagnostics

  • echasnovski/mini.nvim#mini.icons (⭐7.5k) - Module of mini.nvim meant as a general icon provider. Uses fixed set of highlight groups. Supports various categories, icon and style customizations, caching for performance. Integrates with built-in filetype matching.

items.title: Awesome Agi Cocosci
items.content_text:
### Communications / Pragmatics

*   [Pragmatic Issue-Sensitive Image Captioning](https://aclanthology.org/2020.findings-emnlp.173/) - ***EMNLP Findings'20***, 2020. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cluster=10608257248144445301)]. Application of Rational Speech Act to Image Captioning.
items.content_html:
Communications / Pragmatics

  • Pragmatic Issue-Sensitive Image Captioning - EMNLP Findings'20, 2020. [All Versions]. Application of Rational Speech Act to Image Captioning.

items.title: Awesome Falsehood
items.content_text:
### Internationalization

*   [Unicode misconceptions](https://jean.abou-samra.fr/blog/unicode-misconceptions/) - A collection of falsehoods on case, encodings, string length, and more.
items.content_html:
Internationalization

  • Unicode misconceptions - A collection of falsehoods on case, encodings, string length, and more.

items.title: Awesome Selfhosted
items.content_text:
### Software / Booking and Scheduling

*   [Seatsurfing](https://seatsurfing.app/) - Webbased app to book seats, desks and rooms for offices. ([Source Code (⭐225)](https://github.com/seatsurfing/backend)) `GPL-3.0` `Docker`

### Software / E-commerce

*   [Solidus](https://solidus.io/) - A free, open-source ecommerce platform that gives you complete control over your store. ([Source Code (⭐5.2k)](https://github.com/solidusio/solidus)) `BSD-3-Clause` `Ruby/Docker`
items.content_html:
Software / Booking and Scheduling

  • Seatsurfing - Webbased app to book seats, desks and rooms for offices. (Source Code (⭐225)) GPL-3.0 Docker

Software / E-commerce

  • Solidus - A free, open-source ecommerce platform that gives you complete control over your store. (Source Code (⭐5.2k)) BSD-3-Clause Ruby/Docker

items.title: Awesome Bash

Shell Script Development

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### PHP / Community

*   [PHP-Vite Starter Repo (⭐44)](https://github.com/nititech/php-vite-starter) - Starter repository, with TypeScript/JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, SASS/SCSS, EJS, SVG and image support.
items.content_html:
PHP / Community

  • PHP-Vite Starter Repo (⭐44) - Starter repository, with TypeScript/JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, SASS/SCSS, EJS, SVG and image support.

items.title: Awesome Polars
items.content_text:
### Official news

*   **August 2023** : Polars announces that it [has raised a a $4M seed round](https://www.pola.rs/posts/company-announcement/)!
*   **July 2024** : Python Polars 1.0 release ! See this [blog post special announcement](https://pola.rs/posts/announcing-polars-1/).
items.content_html:
Official news

  • August 2023 : Polars announces that it has raised a a $4M seed round!
  • July 2024 : Python Polars 1.0 release ! See this blog post special announcement.
